titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I revised a sermon for use in Manchester next Sunday: and then attended a meeting of the Governors of the High School in the Shire Hall. The Archdeacon came to lunch. There was a meeting of the Archdeaconry of Hereford Clerical Charity in the Library at 2.30 p.m., at which I presided. When this was over, I took the Archdeacon home to Bridstow in the car.
